column2: "Ah, it's been a while. I've heard stories about you."
"I'm taking a break. Just finished some requests, so I can finally catch my breath."
"Not only did I create new Genesis for Regius and Maria, but I've improved existing Genesis Weapons as well."
"I'm really worn out from all of that. I put my soul into them."
"I really don't want to see another Genesis Weapon for a while. They require exact precision and care to maintain; they're far too easy to break them."
"However, I take pride in being able to work on each one. I'm really satsified with my craftsmanship."
"Though, these are rough times to require the need of such powerful weapons."
"All I can do is pour my soul into these weapons that people request from me."
"I hope from the creations I have made, will help and protect others when needed."
"Hey Zieg! I was right to give this for a spin. Labrys is broken, please fix it."

"...<%me>.
Please take care of your weapons, ok?"
